articles.description: Walmart Inc, the world's largest retailer, said on Friday it was selling its retail operations in Argentina to South American supermarket chain owner Grupo de Narváez, pulling back as the country grapples with an economic crisis.
articles.content: BUENOS AIRES (Reuters) - Walmart Inc, the worlds largest retailer, said on Friday it was selling its retail operations in Argentina to South American supermarket chain owner Grupo de Narváez, pulling… [+3322 chars]

articles.author: Michelle Toh, CNN Business
articles.title: India is letting WhatsApp offer payments to millions more users - CNN
articles.description: Millions more WhatsApp users in India can finally start sending each other money through the app.
